system.description: When significant time passes (months or years) or when major changes shake the world, roll +Mood to see how your family adapts.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: The changing times are hard on your family. Choose two: reduce a stat by 1, take 2 Sleepers, lose a significant asset, or face a serious crisis that threatens family unity.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: Your family weathers the changes with some difficulty. Choose one: reduce a stat by 1, take 1 Sleepers, or lose a minor asset. Then choose one benefit: increase a different stat by 1, improve Mood by 1, or gain a new opportunity.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: Your family thrives in the changing world. Choose two: increase a stat by 1, improve Mood by 1, gain a significant asset, or unlock a new family move. Characters may also retire and be replaced by the next generation.
